actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide that no State or local government shall be obligated to take any action required by Federal law enacted after the date of the enactment of this Act unless the expenses of such government in taking such action are funded by the United States.

summary.text: Provides that no State or local government shall be obligated to take any action required by Federal law enacted after the enactment of this Act unless the expenses of such government in taking such action are funded by the United States.

titles.title: A bill to provide that no State or local government shall be obligated to take any action required by Federal law enacted after the date of the enactment of this Act unless the expenses of such government in taking such action are funded by the United States.
